pullRequest.title: Fix items with sword tool tag not instantly breaking bamboo
pullRequest.bodyText:
Bamboo is normally instamined by anything that's instanceof SwordItem.
This change lets items in the fabric:swords tag do so as well.
(Not sure if these should be two separate mixins or one mixin targeting both classes since the injects are identical.)

commit.message: Fix items with sword tool tag not instantly breaking bamboo

nodes.bodyText: I'd suggest using an instanceof @Redirect here instead of this @Inject that effectively overwrites the method.
Please add a description of why the injects exist here just so future maintainers know the purpose for the mixin existing.
